channel.title: How do i change the ips so that i can log into my brand new client
channel.description:
hey guys i just downloaded a new source and client so that i could make a server but when i first try to log into the client it says error connecting to server.... ive been told i need to change the ips but idk where. i would really appreciate it if someone could help me through tv message me if ur intrested in helping me rep++ and another heafty award aswell
thanks guys :)
